channel.title: Logging on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Logging with LogDNA
item.description: Cloudant is now rolling out customer-facing logging for its Cloudant services. In this post we’ll explore how to set it up and how it can help you keep tabs on your Cloudant service. Note: The IBM Cloud Log Analysis service is available in the following IBM Cloud regions: https://cloud.ibm.com/docs/Cloudant?topic=Cloudant-log-analysis-integration. Photo by Pär Pärsson on Unsplash Setting up logging Firstly we need to setup an IBM Log Analysis with LogDNA service in the IBM Cloud - choose the service from the Developer Tools section of the catalog:
